text: Captain Meryl ir'Ravalas leads the [[Starilaskur]] chapter of the [[King's Dark Lanterns]] of [[Breland]]. He is a handsome man with a disarming smile, a keen strategic mind, and a tendency to employ [[changeling]]s for delicate missions.
title: Meryl ir'Ravalas
tags: humanoid [[King's Dark Lanterns]] inquisitive human Starilaskur
tooltip: leader of Starilaskur chapter of the King's Dark Lanterns
